name: Random Object Spinulator
description:
Made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jame 2022!

Developed by BatYaggy (16 years old)

Imagine you are a cookie climbing up a tall structure when you suddenly transform into a table and tumble down. That's this game in a nutshell.

Enjoy randomly switching between over 75 different objects every 10 seconds.
